001package squidpony.squidmath;
002
003public class WarbleNoise implements Noise.Noise3D {
004
005    public WarbleNoise(){
006        this(0x1234567890ABCDEFL);
007    }
008    public WarbleNoise(long seed) {
009        this.seed = seed;
010        workSeed[0] = workSeed[3] = DiverRNG.determineDouble(seed) + 0.5;
011        workSeed[1] = workSeed[4] = DiverRNG.determineDouble(seed + 1L) + 0.5;
012        workSeed[2] = workSeed[5] = DiverRNG.determineDouble(seed + 2L) + 0.5;
013    }
014    protected long seed;
015    /**
016     * Where the extra outputs of {@link #getNoise(double, double, double)} and
017     * {@link #getNoiseWithSeed(double, double, double, long)} are stored; for 3D noise, items 0 through 2 store valid
018     * results, and for higher-dimensional noise up to 6 outputs can be requested.
019     */
020    public final double[] results = new double[6];
021    private final double[] working = new double[18];
022    private final double[] workSeed = new double[12];
023
024    @Override
025    public double getNoise(double x, double y, double z) {
026        working[0] = working[3] = working[6] = x;
027        working[1] = working[4] = working[7] = y;
028        working[2] = working[5] = working[8] = z;
029        warble(3);
030        warble(3);
031        warble(3);
032        for (int i = 0; i < 9; i++) {
033            working[i] *= Math.PI;
034        }
035        for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
036            results[i] = sway(i, 0, 3.0);
037        }
038        return results[0];
039    }
040
041    @Override
042    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, double z, long seed) {
043        workSeed[0] = workSeed[3] = DiverRNG.determineDouble(seed) + 0.5;
044        workSeed[1] = workSeed[4] = DiverRNG.determineDouble(seed + 1L) + 0.5;
045        workSeed[2] = workSeed[5] = DiverRNG.determineDouble(seed + 2L) + 0.5;
046        return getNoise(x, y, z);
047    }
048    private double sway(int element, int workingOffset, double seedChange) {
049        return NumberTools.sin(workSeed[element] + seedChange + working[element + 2 + workingOffset]
050                - NumberTools.cos(workSeed[element + 2] + seedChange + working[element + 1 + workingOffset])
051                + NumberTools.cos(workSeed[element + 1] + seedChange + working[element + workingOffset]));
052    }
053    private void warble(final int size){
054        for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
055            results[i] = working[i] + sway(i, 1, 0.0);
056        }
057        System.arraycopy(results, 0, working, 0, size);
058        System.arraycopy(results, 0, working, size, size);
059        System.arraycopy(results, 0, working, size + size, size);
060        for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
061            results[i] += sway(i, 2, 1.0);
062        }
063        System.arraycopy(results, 0, working, 0, size);
064        System.arraycopy(results, 0, working, size, size);
065        System.arraycopy(results, 0, working, size + size, size);
066        for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
067            results[i] = (results[i] + sway(i, 0, 2.0)) * 0.25;
068        }
069        System.arraycopy(results, 0, working, 0, size);
070        System.arraycopy(results, 0, working, size, size);
071        System.arraycopy(results, 0, working, size + size, size);
072    }
073    /*
074const float SEED = 42.0;
075const vec3 COEFFS = fract((SEED + 23.4567) * vec3(0.8191725133961645, 0.6710436067037893, 0.5497004779019703)) + 0.5;
076
077vec3 swayRandomized(vec3 seed, vec3 value)
078{
079    return sin(seed.xyz + value.zxy - cos(seed.zxy + value.yzx) + cos(seed.yzx + value.xyz));
080}
081
082vec3 cosmic(vec3 c, vec3 con)
083{
084    con += swayRandomized(c, con.yzx);
085    con += swayRandomized(c + 1.0, con.xyz);
086    con += swayRandomized(c + 2.0, con.zxy);
087    return con * 0.25;
088}
089
090void mainImage( out vec4 fragColor, in vec2 fragCoord )
091{
092    // Normalized pixel coordinates (from 0 to 1)
093    vec2 uv = fragCoord/iResolution.xy * 64.0 + swayRandomized(COEFFS.zxy, (iTime * 0.1875) * COEFFS.yzx).xy * 32.0;
094    // aTime, s, and c could be uniforms in some engines.
095    float aTime = iTime * 0.0625;
096    vec3 adj = vec3(-1.11, 1.41, 1.61);
097    vec3 s = (swayRandomized(vec3(34.0, 76.0, 59.0), aTime + adj)) * 0.25;
098    vec3 c = (swayRandomized(vec3(27.0, 67.0, 45.0), aTime - adj)) * 0.25;
099    vec3 con = vec3(0.0004375, 0.0005625, 0.0008125) * aTime + c * uv.x + s * uv.y;
100
101    con = cosmic(COEFFS, con);
102    con = cosmic(COEFFS, con);
103    con = cosmic(COEFFS, con);
104
105    fragColor = vec4(swayRandomized(COEFFS + 3.0, con * (3.14159265)) * 0.5 + 0.5,1.0);
106}
107     */
108}
